item.title: CVE-2023-25715|2024-08-02T11:32:11.416Z -- gamipress -- gamipress%20%E2%80%93%20the%20%231%20gamification%20plugin%20to%20reward%20points%2C%20achievements%2C%20badges%20%26%20ranks%20in%20wordpress
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in GamiPress GamiPress – The #1 gamification plugin to reward points, achievements, badges & ranks in WordPress.This issue affects GamiPress – The #1 gamification plugin to reward points, achievements, badges & ranks in WordPress: from n/a through 2.5.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-24000|2024-08-02T10:49:08.809Z -- gamipress -- gamipress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in GamiPress gamipress allows SQL Injection.This issue affects GamiPress: from n/a through 2.5.7.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in GamiPress.This issue affects GamiPress: from n/a through 6.8.5.
